document.full_text: brent crude jumped to a 2-1/2 year peak above $122 a barrel on tuesday, gaining for a fourth straight day as conflict and unrest in africa and the middle east more than offset china's latest interest rate hike.
document.title: brent jumps to 2-1/2 year peak, u.s. oil slips
lines_and_colors: brent crude jumped to a 2-1/2 year peak above $122 a barrel on tuesday, gaining for a fourth straight day as conflict and unrest in africa and the middle east more than offset china's latest interest rate hike.
